query:
INSERT INTO portfolios (
                    id,
                    name,
                    description,
                    theme
                ) VALUES (
                    $1, $2, $3, $4
                )
                RETURNING id as "id!: Uuid",
                          name,
                          description,
                          theme,
                          created_at as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                          updated_at as "updated_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
